archimate:BusinessObject.name: LAN
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
"A Local Area Network is a computer network covering a specific local area, like a home, office or small group of buildings. It provides communication between computers and devices.
The topology of a network dictates its physical structure. In DEN-ng, this is represented as a collection of endpoints of a common type that are all able to intercommunicate directly with each other, without the assistance of bridging or routing services. "
